financialLiteracy.heroText: Before embarking on an investment journey, build your financial fortress! Imagine savings as seeds you plant, and consumption management as fertile soil that nourishes them. When your financial foundation is solid, you'll be able to invest your money with confidence and achieve returns that ensure a bright and prosperous future. Don't let the opportunity pass you by, start building your financial future today, and invest wisely to reap the fruits of success

investment.title: What is Investment?
investment.definition: Investment is not just a financial decision, but a leap towards a bright future, a journey that transforms you from a spectator to a wealth creator. Imagine building a palace of dreams, brick by brick, with each brick representing a smart investment.

saving.title: What is Saving?
saving.definition: Saving is setting aside a portion of your money today to achieve your future goals
saving.stepsTitle: First Steps Towards a Secure Financial Future

consumption.title: What is Consumption?
consumption.definition: Consumption is the use of goods and services to meet needs and desires. It is an essential element of economic life.
consumption.relationText: A close and interconnected relationship that forms the basis of the economy at both individual and national levels

investment.title: Investment: The Gateway to Wealth Building
investment.text: Investment isn't just about saving money; it's the art of growing it. Imagine building a palace of opportunities, where every investment decision is a brick in the edifice of your wealth.
tips: Start with small amounts and invest regularly
Diversify your investment portfolio to minimize risks

saving.title: Saving: The Foundation of Financial Growth
saving.text: Just as a tree needs strong roots, your financial future requires a solid savings foundation. Regular saving is the fuel that drives the wheel of growth.
tips: Allocate 20% of your income to savings first
Use savings tools with viable returns

consumption.title: Conscious Consumption: The Art of Resource Management
consumption.text: Smart consumption is a delicate balance between needs and wants. Like a wise farmer who prudently distributes water between crops.

incomeSection.title: What is Income?
incomeSection.definition: Income is the amount of money earned by an individual or entity over a specific period of time. It represents the resources available for consumption, saving, or investment.

financialLiteracy.closingTitle: Don't Hesitate to Begin Your Financial Journey
financialLiteracy.closingText: Don't be afraid to take risks, as every success requires some risk. Look for investment opportunities that suit you and consult experts. Start small, invest wisely, and watch your investments grow.

fields.noadditionalcosts: There are no additional costs. You can add project-specific costs.

method.useSelf-financing: Using personal capital to fully finance the project Self financing
method.usebankloan: Obtaining a loan to fully or partially finance the project
